Human Services Data Specification (HSDS) OpenAPI Spec v1.0

This is the API definition for the HSDS format (v1.0). It is available as an HTML list, JSON and YAML OpenAPI Specifications. If you are looking for the schema for HSDS, there is a separate JSON schema available for the project.

How To Engage:
  • Documentation (v1.1)
  • Schema (v1.1)
  • OpenAPI (YAML) (v1.1)
  • Discussion (v1.1)
  • v1.0
  • Diff
Locations
Locations /locations/ GET
Locations /locations/ POST
Location /locations/{location_id}/ GET
Locations /locations/{location_id}/ PATCH
Delete Location /locations/{location_id}/ DELETE
Find Nearby Locations /locations/{location_id}/nearby/ GET
Location Address /locations/{location_id}/address/ POST
Update Location Address /locations/{location_id}/address/{address_id}/ PATCH
Delete Location Address /locations/{location_id}/address/{address_id}/ DELETE
Location Mailing Address /locations/{location_id}/mail_address/ POST
Update Location Mailing Address /locations/{location_id}/address/{mail_address_id}/ PATCH
Delete Location Mailing Address /locations/{location_id}/address/{mail_address_id}/ DELETE
Get Location Contacts /locations/{location_id}/contacts/ GET
Create Location Contacts /locations/{location_id}/contacts/ POST
Update Location Contact /locations/{location_id}/contacts/{contact_id}/ PATCH
Delete Location Contact /locations/{location_id}/contacts/{contact_id}/ DELETE
Create Location Phone /locations/{location_id}/phones/ POST
Update Location Phone /locations/{location_id}/phones/{phone_id}/ PATCH
Delete Location Phone /locations/{location_id}/phones/{phone_id}/ DELETE
Services /locations/{location_id}/services/ GET
Create Location Phone /locations/{location_id}/services/ POST
Update Location Service /locations/{location_id}/services/{service_id}/ PATCH
Delete Location Service /locations/{location_id}/services/{service_id}/ DELETE
Organizations
Organizations /organizations/ GET
Organizations /organizations/ POST
Organizations /organizations/{organization_id}/ GET
Organizations /organizations/{organization_id}/ PATCH
Organizations /organizations/{organization_id}/ DELETE
Organization Locations /organizations/{organization_id}/locations/ GET
